<<<<<<< HEAD
Prince Rupert his declaration. Declaratie van Prins Robert. English Rupert, Prince, Count Palatine, 1619-1682.
[2], 6 p.
Printed by Leonard Lichfield, printer to the Vniversity., Oxford, : 1642.
A soldierly vindication of his troops by Prince Rupert and an attempt to shift the charge of inhumanity to his adversaries. This edition has "RVPERT" in title and text on p. 6 begins: and that of. Annotation on Thomason copy: "Decemb: 2d". Reproduction of the original at the British Library.
=======

A soldierly vindication of his troops by Prince Rupert and an attempt to shift the charge of inhumanity to his adversaries. This edition has "RVPERT" in title and text on p. 6 begins: and that of. Annotation on Thomason copy: "Decemb: 2d". Reproduction of the original at the British Library.
the Vniversity.
Leonard Lichfield
